about_the_game:
Black Scrolls Docks and Canals (Map Tile Pack)

This set is an expansion of our City Set.

Although some of the tiles can be used as stand-alone areas, you'll see its full glory only using with that set together. This set is also compatible with the Tropical Islands set. See examples below.

73 tiles that contain dock areas, huge and wide bridges with buildings, loading areas, a ship, canals, canals with bridges, cut out boats and sewer entrances, and a lighthouse.

Every tile has an alternative and unique night version!

Features of the printed tiles:

  • You will get 73, double-sided Docks and Canals tiles.
  • 3 description tiles (cover, addresses + content, sample map)
  • (10) Dock side tiles
  • (9) Dock corner pieces and canal intersections
  • (2) Lighthouse at the docks
  • (24) Canal pieces (straight, and T-L-X intersections, bridges)
  • (8) Huge bridge with houses (inside and roofs)
  • (3) Warehouse, loading area
  • (7) Cut-outs: boats, sewer entrance, canal ends, small bridge, wooden bridge, big piers
  • (2) Cargo ship
  • (5) Water tiels
Detailed, lovingly crafted graphics which will make your gaming nights more thrilling!

The design of the tiles is the result of our eight years' experience we spent in the mobile game and tabletop game business. We hope that the 3D rendered graphic we use will represent a higher standard in tabletop gaming and provide a more thrilling gaming experience for our customers at a more affordable price.

The huge bridge with buildings can be used a side of the docks

with city tiles on the other side or as a wider bridge in a wide river.

Use it with the City Set together!

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Antal Keninger

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
